name: Shot Type
description: Technical details of how a video is filmed or edited.

name: Age Group
description: Implied age ranges for characters, not performers.

name: Themes
description: Events, contexts, or fetishes often featured in scenes.

name: Misc
description: Information about the video itself rather than its content, or various descriptors that do not fit other tag categories.

name: Acts
description: Various sexual acts or positions, excluding typical "finishers".

name: Body Type
description: Various descriptions of body fat, body shape, body hair, or muscle tone.

name: Skin Tone
description: Various skin tones, colorations, or other notable features.

name: Roles
description: Common character archetypes or personalities.

name: Surfaces
description: What the action takes place on top of, often furniture of some kind.

name: Locations
description: Where the action takes place.

name: Accessories
description: Notable devices or materials directly involved in the action.

name: Finishers
description: Acts that typically end a scene, often involving ejaculation or orgasm.

name: Moods
description: A character's emotions, a performer's style, or the overall tone of the scene.

name: Clothing
description: Articles or styles of clothing worn by a performer that is featured in the scene.

name: Motivations
description: What motivates the characters into starting the action.

name: Race
description: Broad categories for a performer's racial background.

name: Hair Color
description: Hair colors for featured performers, including wigs and dyes.

name: Relations
description: How characters know each other, including casual, romantic, professional, and familial relationships.

name: Genitals
description: Various descriptions of a performer's genitals or pubic hair, often regarding size.

name: Height
description: Defined ranges of a performer's height, separated by gender.

name: Hair Style
description: Various descriptions of hair styles, cuts, textures, and lengths.

name: Breasts
description: Various descriptions of a performer's breasts or nipples, often regarding size.

name: Ass
description: Various descriptions of a performer's backside, often regarding size.

name: Face
description: Various descriptions of a performer's facial features.

name: Orientation
description: Broad categories of sex/gender combinations, often aligning more closely to traditional marketing terms than real-world sexual orientations.

name: Piercings
description: Various types of body piercings.

name: Tattoos
description: Various types of permanent tattoos.

name: Group Makeup
description: Number of scene partners and often their genders.
